works.description:
Several works by Mike Resnick are located
 
inside a .RAR file posted and labeled as "Sunday, June 19, 2011 Science  
Fiction eBooks - Kindle .Mobi format"
", including the following specific works of Mike Resnick located in  
said .rar file:

Alien Radio - Mike Resnick & Nick DiChario.mobi
All The Things You Are - Mike Resnick.mobi
Last Dog, The - Mike Resnick.mobi
Omega Egg [A Fictionwise Round Robin Novel], The - Mike Resnick & Various 

Authors.mobi
Oracle - Mike Resnick.mobi
Princess of Earth, A - Mike Resnick.mobi
Prophet - Mike Resnick.mobi
Robots Don't Cry - Mike Resnick.mobi
Seven Views of Olduvai Gorge - Mike Resnick.mobi
Sideshow_ Tales of the Galactic Midway, Vol. 1 - Mike Resnick.mobi
Soothsayer - Mike Resnick.mobi
Soul Eater, The - Mike Resnick.mobi
Three-Legged Hootch Dancer_ Tales of the Galactic Midway, Vol. 2, The -  
Mike Resnick.mobi

*** In addition, as you can tell by simple inspection, the blog itself is
a  
site for this person to post pirate material and license keys, etc.   
Clearly a terms of service violation for you in addition to the obvious  
copyright violations.
